page.title: 13A DAY IN MY LIFE AT SCHOOL
page.content:
by Leah Watson.
I come downstairs at 8 o'clock. After breakfast I clean my teeth, collect my lunch box and set off for school with my sister Nadine. After a brief game in the playground we go into school, get our hymn books and go into assembly. Mr. Beeby talks to us about all sorts of different things, we sing a hymn, say a prayer and some- times Mr. Beeby has some news for us. After assembly we do some Maths or English,then it is playtime. Most of us have some tuck to eat such as crisps,biscuits,or fruit. We play out in the playground when it is fine, if wet,we stay indoors,play games,draw or read. Sometimes we write a story after play. After lunch today we did a project on flowers,then apparatus work in the hall. We go home at 3.30p.m.
